summary: Experienced floral designer and educator with AIFD mentorship, extensive history of owning and operating floristry businesses in Las Vegas, including Tropicana Hotel Florist and Caesar's Palace venues. Skilled in national and international flower auctions, trend analysis, event and hotel floristry, wedding chapel management, and teaching.

experience.title: Owner/Operator Tropicana Hotel Florist
experience.description: Promoted and operated the Tropicana Hotel Florist; hired and terminated employees; procured inventory; negotiated lease terms with hotel management; interfaced with purchasing; produced prototypes of floral designs; managed store layout and hours; oversaw taxes and regulatory compliance.

experience.title: Owner/Operator Garden of the Nile Flower Shop at Caesar's Palace
experience.company: Garden of the Nile Flower Shop, Caesar's Palace (Las Vegas)
experience.description: Owned and operated Garden of the Nile Flower Shop; managed inventory and procurement; kept up with floral industry trends; negotiated with hotel management and purchasers; led design prototyping and quality checks.

experience.title: President Island Wedding Chapel
experience.company: Island Wedding Chapel at the Tropicana Hotel
experience.description: Negotiated lease for the freestanding wedding chapel; formed corporation; oversaw location, architecture, and construction; hired manager and staff; coordinated hotel accommodations, receptions, catering, and wedding operations.

experience.title: Owner/Operator Las Vegas Hilton Florist
experience.description: Hired and terminated employees; procured inventory for fresh floral arrangements; interfaced with hotel management and purchasing; produced floral design prototypes; managed store layout and hours.

experience.title: Owner/Operator Desert Flower
experience.description: Acquired fresh flowers from national and international growers; managed store layout; procured containers and props; studied market trends; prepared employees; interfaced with flower auctions; ensured compliance and operations.

experience.title: Owner Frowners R Us
experience.description: Promoted and performed design work; negotiated leases; procured inventory; designed shop layout; interfaced with hotel management and purchasing; led staff training and design development; ensured compliance and operation.

experience.title: Guest Teacher
experience.description: Presented class material and policies across multiple classes; supported students; classroom management and instruction; maintained attendance and behavior monitoring.

experience.title: Lead Floral Designer
experience.description: Led floral design projects; managed inventory and procurement; interfaced with hotel management and purchasing; produced design prototypes; managed store layout and operations.

experience.title: High School Substitute Teacher
experience.description: Substituted high school classes; assisted with assignments and student supervision; maintained classroom routines and behavior; supported students' understanding of subject matter.

education.school: Louisiana State University and Agricultural & Mechanical College

certifications: Floral Designer – Advanced Licensed Certified Floral Designer (1978)
Floral Exam – Passed with perfect score (LSU A&M)
